sentences.cn: 各大银行都有国债承购包销的业务.

sentences.en: Bank holding companies could own other financial companies that would underwrite new stocks.
sentences.cn: 银行控股公司可以拥有其他拥有新股票的金融公司.

sentences.en: Grant foreign banks the right to underwrite bond on the same terms as local banks.
sentences.cn: 准许外国银行有权按本土银行同样的条件从事债券保险业务.

sentences.en: Investment banks handle stocks, bonds and other securities. They underwrite new offerings.
sentences.cn: 投资银行可以掌控股票 、 债券以及其它证券, 也可以认购新股.

sentences.en: Public institutions will survive these cutbacks because state monies will continue to underwrite operating expenses.
sentences.cn: 公立院校将渡过这种削减的困难,因为州财政将同意继续承担办学费用.

sentences.en: The government has agreed to underwrite the project with a grant of £5 million.
sentences.cn: 政府同意拨款 500 万英镑资助该项目。

sentences.en: The government will have to create a special agency to underwrite small business loans.
sentences.cn: 政府将不得不建立一个专门机构来为小额企业贷款提供担保。

sentences.en: They can again own investment companies that underwrite securities.
sentences.cn: 银行又允许投资公司认购包销证券.

sentences.en: They have undertaken to underwrite a large proportion of the supermarket's deficits.
sentences.cn: 他们已承诺支付该超级市场赤字的一大部分.

sentences.en: This opens up lots of new marketing opportunities, which could underwrite fees.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上商机无限, 利润无穷.

sentences.en: What types of cover does your insurance company usually underwrite?
sentences.cn: 你们的保险公司一般承保哪些险别?

words.tran_cn: 保险公司；保险业者；承诺支付者；担保人

trans.tran_cn: 给保险；承诺支付；签在下
trans.tran_en: if an insurance company underwrites an insurance contract, it agrees to pay for any damage or loss that happens

trans.tran_cn: 签名承认（担保），签名接受（保险），给…保险，认购，在…下面写
